tinyZenpage - A TinyMCE plugin for Zenphoto with Zenpage

Requirements:

Zenphoto 1.2.1 or later, Zenpage 1.0.0 or later

Installation:

  1. Download the tinyZenpage package and extract its contents.
  2. Move the tinyzenpage folder into zp-core/plugins/tiny_mce/plugins
  3. Move the texteditorconfig.php file into zp-core/plugins/zenpage and replace the one of the same name that is included in Zenpage package.
    If you have already have customized this file just add tinyzenpage to the plugin: "..." call to load the plugin and also to the theme_advanced_buttons[number] call where you want the tinyZenpage button to appear.

A small user guide is included with the plugin itself.

Vistit also the Zenpage project site
